entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
